reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate for congenital metabolic disorder umbrella term summing major subcategories: amino acid metabolism disorders, organic acid disorders, urea cycle disorders, fatty acid oxidation disorders, lysosomal storage diseases, mitochondrial disorders, glycogen storage diseases, and other inherited metabolic conditions (~1-4 per 100k births, converting to ~3 per 100k population incidence annually). Low confidence due to extreme heterogeneity, diagnostic variability across regions, and high rate of undiagnosed cases in low-resource settings.
